Notes: Tracks money set aside for credit card payments. Auto-created when credit cards enabled. Affects reconciliation: Available Cash = Bank Balance - CC Holding. Do not manually top up - system manages this automatically.
Legacy credit card debt from before budgeting started. Part of debt payoff journey (separate from current CC spending). Pay down to zero as part of My Budget Way Step 2.
Special envelope for unallocated funds - auto-created by system
First $1000 emergency fund (My Budget Way Step 1)
3 months essential expenses (My Budget Way Step 3)
